nodes.label: Networking Fundamentals
nodes.description: Understand TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/S, and basic network structure.

nodes.label: Linux & Scripting
nodes.description: Use Bash, PowerShell, and understand Linux OS deeply.

nodes.label: Web Security Basics
nodes.description: Know how web attacks work: XSS, CSRF, SQLi.

nodes.label: Network Security Tools
nodes.description: Learn about Wireshark, Nmap, and firewalls.

nodes.label: Penetration Testing
nodes.description: Use Metasploit, Burp Suite for ethical hacking.

nodes.label: Security Policies & Compliance
nodes.description: Familiarize yourself with GDPR, HIPAA, and security governance.
